name: UpdateListSegment
description:
Batch update members in a Mailchimp list segment.

Use this tool to batch add or remove members in a specified static segment of a Mailchimp list. This is useful for efficiently managing segment membership within a list.

parameters.name: list_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Mailchimp list.

value_schema.description: The unique ID for the list.

parameters.name: segment_unique_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the segment in the Mailchimp list for member updates.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the segment.

parameters.name: emails_to_add_to_segment
parameters.description: An array of email addresses to add to the specified static segment. Only existing list emails will be added. Limit of 500.

value_schema.description: An array of emails to be used for a static segment. Any emails provided that are not present on the list will be ignored. A maximum of 500 members can be sent.

parameters.name: emails_to_remove_from_segment
parameters.description: An array of up to 500 emails to remove from the static segment. Emails not in the list will be ignored.

value_schema.description: An array of emails to be used for a static segment. Any emails provided that are not present on the list will be ignored. A maximum of 500 members can be sent.
